name: Jumpy Street Online
description:
Jumpy Street Online was a solo project I created near the end of my Programming II class. The assignment was a simple clone of "Crossy Road" (a mobile-based frogger clone). Having some extra time on my hands, I decided to go all out with this project and added multiplayer gameplay and power-ups.

Jumpy Street Online also contains my second attempt at a water shader, this time using ShaderGraph, an experimental unity feature for the new rendering pipelines allowing you to design shaders with node based scripting.
